activities: Personal information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:  Elo collects information during transactions and communications with customers and other third parties including when users purchase, register, update, request support for Elo products and services, enroll in programs or request product or other information from Elo.  Elo receives, processes and uses such information for business purposes including marketing, facilitating transactions, customer support, communications, delivering and improving products and services, data storage, contests or promotions. Elo receives, processes, and uses HR related data in connection with human resources related activities, including administering employee compensation, benefits and employee management.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line customer data and human resources data
